name: Circuit
description: Circuit is a retro-styled oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With a box-shaped body resembling a vintage console, Circuit has a set of buttons that resemble a cat's eyes, giving it a playful and charming appearance. Its arms and legs have been designed in the form of soldier figurines, showcasing its strength and agility. The screen on Circuit's chest displays a striking red and black pattern, resembling old-school oscilloscope displays. Additionally, Circuit is equipped with an addon in the form of a helmet, which enhances its intelligence and protection capabilities.
